snippet: After the R&B musician Frank Ocean used his Tumblr to write of his love for a man, a critic who recently interviewed him reflects on sexual orientation and lingering social norms.
abstract: After the R&B musician Frank Ocean used his Tumblr to write of his love for a man, a critic who recently interviewed him reflects on sexual orientation and lingering social norms.

headline.main: A Musician and a Critic Make Some Points About Love
